title: GTA San Andreas modded by uG.KaiN[C][FS] 1.90 ALPHA-PUBLIC TEST
description:
This is first alpha version of 1.90 build of modded GTA:san andreas by uG.KaiN[C][FS].


uG.KaiN[C][FS] presents the official website of the Mod's packs with all torrents to the new and old mod's: <a href="
http://mod.ultimate-game.pl" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://mod.ultimate-game.pl</a>


SCREENSHOTS: <a href=" http://kainowy.pl/screen/SCREENY_MOD_1_90_BETA.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://kainowy.pl/screen/SCREENY_MOD_1_90_BETA.html</a>

Tested on: Win 8.1 spring x86 pro N, AMD FX-4100 4 * 3.8Ghz, Club3d Radeon HD7770 1GB, 4GB RAM DDR3 1666Mhz.
Never had under 30 FPS on 1920*1080 reso, antialiasing at 3, very high quality and even when had some porns downloading in the background.

PLX Don't run it on low-end computers.
System requirements:
-1+GB ram
-4GB HDD
-512+MB Video RAM graphic card with pixel shader 2.0(+) (GTFO with intel GMA/Intel HD)

**********************************

IMPORTANT:
-HD_PACK-extract_to_gta_folder.rar -> extract it and overwrite all files, elseway you can't get nice looking graphics
->If you do so, to turn off/on HD graphics Press SHIFT+F12

Changelog:
-Added crash protection
-Removed radio, which was bugging
-added MOUSE BUGFIX (mouse couldn't be clicked while in menu/ingame on single player)
-several texture bugs repaired
-removed all the rest of textures from best HD texture pack called srt. go to hell with this bugging ****.


**********************************
